title: Shoe Cleaner Kit With Shoe Brushes, Quantum Clean Kit, Shoe Cleaner For Leather Shoes, White Sneakers, Suede, Canvas, 100% All-Natural Formula, 8oz, Soft and Stiff Shoe Brushes, Shoe Deodorizer
features: Complete Shoe Care Kit: Bring any dirty shoe back to life with our advanced, multipurpose shoe cleaner that fights dirt, oils, stains, and sweat. Our special soft and stiff bristle brushes thoroughly clean shoes without scratching or damaging them.

Cleans ALL shoe materials: Scientifically formulated to clean and restore over 85 different materials including leather, neoprene, canvas, suede, vinyl, and more. From dirty white sneakers to smelly leather shoes to delicate suede boots, this shoe cleaner kit is designed to handle them all.

Effective Shoe Deodorizer: Our 100% all-natural odor-fighting shoe cleaner deep cleanses your shoes to help remove odors caused by perspiration leaving behind a fresh, clean scent that you and those around you will appreciate.

Easy At-Home Use: Our simple yet effective shoe cleaner kit lets you clean your sneakers or shoes at home, effortlessly. With just one spray for every need and two brushes for settled stains and fine dust, cleaning your shoes has never been this easy.

Usage Directions: Spray the Quantum Shoe Care Cleaner on the shoes. Gently scrub with a wet brush until the stains disappear. Choose our soft brush for suede and other delicate materials. Rinse with fresh water. Wipe clean and let dry.
description: Make a spot-free impression every time with the Quantum Shoe Clean Kit. A complete shoe care solution. Our scientifically-formulated deep cleaning solution with stiff and soft-bristled brushes effectively remove dirt, grime, and odors from any shoe. The Quantum Clean Kit can be used on over 85 different surfaces.
